flavorText: At last, the storm's rage subsided, leaving silent, frozen beauty in its wake.

foreignData.flavorText: Schließlich ließ der Zorn des Sturms nach. Zurück blieb stille, eisige Schönheit.
foreignData.name: Glitzernder Frost
foreignData.text:
Verzaubert ein Land
Das verzauberte Land ist verschneit.
Immer wenn das verzauberte Land für Mana getappt wird, erzeugt sein Beherrscher ein zusätzliches Mana einer beliebigen Farbe.

foreignData.flavorText: Al fin, la ira de la tormenta se aplacó y dejó tras de sí una belleza helada y silenciosa.
foreignData.name: Escarcha reluciente
foreignData.text:
Encantar tierra.
La tierra encantada es una tierra nevada.
Siempre que se gire la tierra encantada para obtener maná, su controlador agrega un maná adicional de cualquier color.

foreignData.flavorText: La rage de la tempête finit par se calmer, laissant dans son sillage une beauté silencieuse et glacée.
foreignData.name: Gel scintillant
foreignData.text:
Enchanter : terrain
Le terrain enchanté est neigeux.
À chaque fois que le terrain enchanté est engagé pour du mana, son contrôleur ajoute un mana supplémentaire de la couleur de son choix.

foreignData.flavorText: Finalmente la furia della tempesta si placò, lasciando una bellezza gelida e silenziosa nella sua scia.
foreignData.name: Gelo Scintillante
foreignData.text:
Incanta terra
La terra incantata è una terra neve.
Ogniqualvolta la terra incantata viene TAPpata per attingere mana, il suo controllore aggiunge un mana addizionale di un qualsiasi colore.

foreignData.flavorText: ついに嵐の怒りが収まり、その後には静かな凍てつく美が残された。
foreignData.name: 輝く霜
foreignData.text:
エンチャント（土地）
エンチャントしている土地は氷雪である。
エンチャントしている土地がマナを引き出す目的でタップされるたび、それのコントローラーは追加で好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。
foreignData.type: 氷雪エンチャント — オーラ

foreignData.flavorText: 마침내, 폭풍우의 분노가 가라앉았고, 그 자취에는 조용히 얼어붙은 아름다움이 남았다.
foreignData.name: 반짝이는 서리
foreignData.text:
대지에 부여
부여된 대지는 눈이다.
부여된 대지가 마나를 위해 탭될 때마다, 그 대지의 조종자는 추가적으로 원하는 색의 마나 한 개를 추가한다.

foreignData.flavorText: Por fim, a fúria da tempestade aplacou-se, deixando em seu rastro apenas uma beleza congelada e silenciosa.
foreignData.name: Geada Brilhante
foreignData.text:
Encantar terreno
O terreno encantado torna-se da neve.
Toda vez que o terreno encantado é virado para gerar mana, seu controlador adiciona um mana extra de qualquer cor.

foreignData.flavorText: Наконец ярость бури утихла, оставив после себя безмолвную ледяную красоту.
foreignData.name: Сверкающий Мороз
foreignData.text:
Зачаровать землю
Зачарованная земля является снежной.
Каждый раз, когда зачарованная земля поворачивается для получения маны, контролирующий ее игрок добавляет одну дополнительную ману любого цвета.

foreignData.flavorText: 最后风暴消退，留下一片静谧的冰封美景。
foreignData.name: 彩华冰霜
foreignData.text:
结附于地
所结附的地是雪境。
每当横置所结附的地以产生法术力时，其操控者额外加一点任意颜色的法术力。

foreignData.flavorText: 最後風暴消退，留下了一片靜謐的冰封美景。
foreignData.name: 彩華冰霜
foreignData.text:
結附於地
所結附的地是雪境。
每當橫置所結附的地以產生魔法力時，其操控者額外加一點任意顏色的魔法力。

name: Glittering Frost
originalText:
Enchant land
Enchanted land is snow.
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of any color.

rulings.text: The enchanted land will retain any other supertypes it may have, such as basic or legendary. It will also retain any subtypes it may have, such as Forest or Island.
Snow is a supertype, not a card type. It has no rules meaning or function by itself, but spells and abilities may refer to it.
The {S} symbol is a generic mana symbol. It represents a cost that can be paid by one mana that was produced by a snow source. That mana can be any color or colorless.
Snow isn’t a type of mana. If an effect says you may spend mana as though it were any type, you can’t pay for {S} using mana that wasn’t produced by a snow source.
Some cards have additional effects for each {S} spent to cast them. You can cast these spells even if you don’t spend any snow mana to cast them; their additional effects simply won’t do anything.

The Kaldheim set doesn’t have any cards with mana costs that include {S}, but some previous sets do. If an effect says such a spell costs {1} less to cast, that reduction doesn’t apply to any {S} costs. This is also true for activated abilities that include {S} in their activation costs and effects that reduce those costs.

text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land is snow.
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of any color.
